issue.title: [Plasma] Use xxh3 for object hashing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6495](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6495). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We recently vendored xxh3 in Arrow. Plasma may want to use it for object hashing, since it's supposed to be even faster than XXH64.
See https://fastcompression.blogspot.com/2019/03/presenting-xxh3.html for performance numbers.
